summary: This bill, the Indian Programs Advance Appropriations Act of 2025, amends the Indian Self-Determination Act and the Indian Health Care Improvement Act. It authorizes advance appropriations for specific accounts within the Bureau of Indian Affairs, Bureau of Indian Education, and Indian Health Service, starting in fiscal year 2026. The bill mandates detailed estimates in the President's budget and requires annual reports to Congress on resource sufficiency, including workload and demand data. It also modifies budget request requirements for various agencies related to these programs.
